sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Using componendo and dividendo, find the value of \(y \) given that 
\[
	\frac{\sqrt{10 y + 3 } + \sqrt{10 y - 3 }}{\sqrt{10 y + 3 } - \sqrt{10 y - 3 }} = 3 
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "The given equation is 
\[
	\frac{\sqrt{10 y + 3 } + \sqrt{10 y - 3 }}{\sqrt{10 y + 3 } - \sqrt{10 y - 3 }} = 3 
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
By using componendo and dividendo and simplifying, we get
\[
	\frac{\input[s2v1]{} \sqrt{10 y + 3 }}{2 \sqrt{10 y - 3 }} = \frac{3 + 1 }{\input[s2v2]{} - 1 }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{\sqrt{10 y + 3 }}{\sqrt{10 y - 3 }} = \frac{4 }{2 }
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{10 y + 3 }{10 y - 3 } = \frac{\input[s3v1]{} }{4 }
\]
Now, cross multiplying and simplifying, we get
\[
	40 y + 12 = \input[s3v2]{} y - 48 
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow 120 y = \input[s4v1]{}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow y = \frac{1 }{\input[s4v2]{} }
\]
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": " "}, {"data": [2, 3], "text": "$$\text{Upon applying componendo and dividendo on $\frac{\sqrt{10 y + 3 } + \sqrt{10 y - 3 }}{\sqrt{10 y + 3 } - \sqrt{10 y - 3 }} = 3 $, we get $\frac{\sqrt{10 y + 3 }}{\sqrt{10 y - 3 }} = \frac{4 }{2 }$}$$ "}, {"data": [16, 160], "text": "$$\{Further simplification of the previous equation gives us the result $40 y + 12 = 160 y - 48 $}$$ "}, {"data": [60, 2], "text": "$$\text{Finally, we get the result $y = \frac{1 }{2 }$}$$"}]
